trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"></xref> class contains information about a trust relationship between two <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest"></xref> objects.
Gets the excluded top-level names in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"></xref> object.
A read/write <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that contains the excluded top-level names in the current object.
Commits any changes to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"></xref> properties to the Active Directory Domain Services store.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
A collision occurred with an existing trust relationship.
Gets the top-level names in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation"></xref> object.
A read-only <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TopLevelNameCollection"></xref> object that contains the top-level names in the current object.
Gets the trusted domain information for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation"></xref> object.

A read-only <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation"></xref> object for the current object.
